com.rshepard.tictactoe

Class TicTacToeUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rshepard.tictactoe.TicTacToeUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class TicTacToeUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    TicTacToeUI creates the GUI for the Tic Tac Toe board and handles all the inputs with an ActionListener

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TicTacToeUI()
      Creates two 3x3 arrays.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TicTacToeUI

        public TicTacToeUI()
        Creates two 3x3 arrays. One for the marks on the board and another one for the graphical representation of the board. The JFrame is used to represent the board on the screen and to handle the inputs from the users.

    • Method Detail

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener

      • getBoard

        public TicTacToeBoard getBoard()
        Returns:
        Returns an instantance of the current board

      • disableButtons

        public void disableButtons()
        Disables all the buttons at the end of the game so that the winning marks can be shown.

      • setWinText

        public void setWinText(java.lang.String text)
        Sets the name of the winner or a draw on the screen
        Parameters:
        text - The String of text that displays the winner on the screen

      • markButton

        public void markButton(int row,
                       int col,
                       Mark mark)
        Marks a specific Mark and location on the GUI of the board
        Parameters:
        row - The row number of the given Mark to be placed
        col - The column number of the given Mark to be placed
        mark - The type of Mark that is to be displayed
